description: Supersoft speckled French terry makes this (tush covering!) turtleneck-sweatshirt hybrid the layering piece you'll want to wear to the gym, to lunch, to, well, everywhere this winter. Loose fit. Body length: 27 1/2. Cotton. Import.
Consider this embroidered layer your new dressy sweatshirt this winter. Slim fit. Body length: 24. Cotton. Import.

Made from supersoft slub cotton and cut for a slightly slouchy fit, this t-shirt is a total summer must. (We made them in a bunch of colors, so feel free to stock up!) Body length: front - 22 3/4, back: 24 3/4. Cotton. Machine wash. Import.

If you've been wary of the bodysuit trend, here's the perfect place to start. Much like a wrap dress or skirt, this ruffle-front silhouette is super-flattering.
